Articles.Content: Just asking, because it's a (low quality) gif. What do you guys think of it?
Asdf movie is the best! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
took me a bit to realize what it was, but after that, it's glorious. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I generally don't like animated avatars, and that one looks like it might cause seizures in epileptics. Sorry, not a fan.

> 
> I generally don't like animated avatars, and that one looks like it might cause seizures in epileptics. Sorry, not a fan.

oh, yeah, might wanna reduce the flashing affect. slow it down maybe?

> 
> I generally don't like animated avatars, and that one looks like it **might cause seizures in epileptics.** Sorry, not a fan.

\*cough\*Yet another reason to outlaw animated avatars.\*cough\* I think shaky avatars would have the same effect, yes?

> 
> I generally don't like animated avatars, and that one looks like it might cause seizures in epileptics. Sorry, not a fan.

Just what I feared. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

EDIT: Wait, what if the old one would score 10/10 with everyone? Tell me what you thought of the old I like trains avatar.

It's not very well looped, and yes as RIC said it could cause problems ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Mabye try less rainbow?

I like it 

About an epilepsy attack from it. It's not bright enough, it's on a forum about a game with a very high epilepsy chance and it looks awesome ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
How's mine?

I tip my hat to yours 

how about mine?

> 
> How's mine?

It's bad and you should feel bad.

Kidding. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) Yours is a good example of an animated avatar done well, its animation is fairly subtle and not as distracting as some others.

> 
> How's mine?

Too big, but better than some of the others I've seen.
I decided that the file size restriction was too small for my purposes... though I might find a way eventually...
I would like to think that mine is reasonable. Is it?
It's way too high of a quality gif....turn the resolution way down, then we'll be good. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Does this satisfy you endersmen?

> 
> I would like to think that mine is reasonable. Is it?

every time I see that mudkip I smile. its just so cute.
If i could i would get mine to stroke his mustache.

I personally find all animated images annoying (Even the otherwise well done Doctor one). However, I just use adblock to hide them forever and go on with my day so no real harm done.

Induce epilepsy at your leisure.

Not present here but Stupid\_Chris's avatar kills me. In a bad way.

Cheers!

I'm thinking of making a *slightly*animated version of my avatar. I'm just gonna make the eyes slowly get brighter.

Or I could add a really creepy enderman face that slowly edges closer screaming...

> 
> I'm thinking of making a *slightly*animated version of my avatar. I'm just gonna make the eyes slowly get brighter.
> Or I could add a really creepy enderman face that slowly edges closer screaming...

I know, I'd love to make one for me with gliding effects or wind, or something along those lines.

Thing is, you are limited to like 20 frames or less...
I can't even set an avatar. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> I can't even set an avatar. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

You need one more post, then you will be able to ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
